title: on them by section 2 of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Public Expenditure, National
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) 
(Revocation) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 5 July 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited public expenditure national development plan delivery reform (delegation ministerial functions) (revocation) order 2023 (2) order come operation 5 july 2023

title: on them by section 2 of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act
heading: 2. The Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and
text_raw:
2. The Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 88 of 2023) 
is revoked. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

4 July, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 21st July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [368] 3
